title.rendered: Kopa Alternative: Choosing The Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
There’s no doubt that moving to a new place is a life-changing experience that is exciting and terrifying in equal measures. There are many factors to consider, including rent, cost of living, city livability, neighborhood type, and more. These concerns might be stressful enough on their own, but when you add in the prospect of finding a suitable roommate? It can be overwhelming! Luckily, using roommate finder websites like Kopa, or the Kopa alternative, Roomi makes finding suitable roommates a breeze!

Don’t sweat about finding the best roommate finder; we’ve already done that for you! Let’s get started.

Pricing: Are these roommate finder apps free or paid?

There are a variety of options for finding housemates. But how can you know which is the best roommate finder? There are several ways to separate the best from the rest, with pricing being one of them!

When compared to other roommate finder websites like Kopa, its alternative Roomi clearly comes out on top. Why? Because there are no monthly subscription fees, no messaging fees, and it’s free to sign up and post a room on Roomi. It’s also completely free to look for a rental. Of course, if you want to get the most out of Roomi, there are paid premium services on offer.

Background checks, identity verification, messaging plans, listing credits, profile boosts, and listing boosts are all included in the Gold Plan bundle. Great, right? It costs $29.99 per month or $14.99 per week to subscribe. You’ll enjoy benefits like more visibility, robust security and could find a room faster!

On Kopa, hosts market their properties, and renters apply to and book those listings, find housemates, and pay deposits and monthly rent. There are no Kopa service fees for renters. Although, keep in mind, while using a credit card, renters pay a 2.9% + 30 cents credit card processing fee. If the payment is from an international account, there is an additional 1% transaction fee.

Users can send security deposits and leases via the platform. Renters need to pay a security deposit when they reserve a room, and that money is sent to the lister directly. Hosts can also refund security deposits to their renters directly through Kopa. They have the option to refund security deposits, add interest where appropriate, and upload copies of receipts for renters to examine when they move out.

They don’t offer background checks or credit checks at this time. If those things are important to you, it’s something you’ll have to arrange separately with the renter, which can be a long-winded process. A few Kopa reviews on Trustpilot suggest that renters are facing issues with refunds due to improper management. For this reason – and some others that we’ll cover in the next section – Roomi makes the best Kopa alternative.

Security: Can these apps help me find roommates I can trust?

In general, life in a new city is expensive. You want to save money in as many ways as possible, and finding safe roomies is one way to do so. Aside from that, you’ll want to be sure you’re getting the most bang for your buck.

Finding roommates on websites like Kopa and Roomi are fantastic, but it’s natural to have concerns such as “are these platforms legit?”. “How effectively is my profile protected?” or “How can I find safe roomies”?

Verification of roommate contact info

The majority of the renters on Kopa are approved by their employers, who are also Kopa’s business partners. Before messaging you, renters fill out a rental application. The only downside in terms of security is that, if you want to do a background check, you need to request one.

The Kopa alternative, Roomi, also considers the security of its users a priority. As such, it ensures the contact information of every user is obtained and verified, excelling in this area. Without invading your privacy, Roomi verifies your contact information (email and phone number). They use the trusted GlobaliD service for this.

Roomi’s goal is to make finding roommates as safe and secure as possible. Every user has the choice to authenticate their identity and do a background check so that others know they’re speaking with a genuine, reliable person.

ID Verifications for potential roommates

The alternative of Kopa, Roomi conducts verification of your government-issued ID and keeps that information safe using GlobaliD. This means that Roomi allows you to select information to keep or remove, depending on specific circumstances. You will obtain the confirmed badge once your ID has been validated, which will strengthen your listing and increase your chances to find suitable roommates.

Privacy & security of profiles

Similarly, Roomi goes above and beyond to protect your data using GlobaliD. It also gives you control over your data, allowing you to delete or change it in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Once you’ve found someone who fits your criteria, you may contact them using the app’s safe in-app chat feature. You won’t have to disclose any additional personal information with a potential roommate as a result of this.

24/7 support & content moderation

The main source of assistance at Roomi is a comprehensive FAQ section that addresses practically every topic that may come up. An in-house content moderation team is also available to provide further help and content moderation so you can find rooms or roommates stress-free!

Criminal background checks

Kopa does not conduct any criminal background checks unless you make a request. Unlike Kopa, Roomi is thorough, and conducts prior criminal background checks against known international and relevant local intelligence.

Roomi is not only simple to use with a clean user interface, but it also streamlines your roommate search while protecting your privacy and considering your interests. With these features, you’ll find safe roomies in no time!

User Profiles: Which App Makes It Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

When looking for a place to rent or for your next roommates, don’t put up with the hassle or scams that can come with Craigslist and Facebook. You can use Roomi to find roommates with a process that’s as simple and stress-free as they come. Both roommate finder apps are excellent, but when comparing their capabilities, the alternative of Kopa, Roomi, comes out on top.

Because it can be difficult to find roommates the way you want, Roomi has made it possible to filter roommates by neighborhoods, gender, budget, and other variables.

Additionally, with Roomi’s Perfect Roommate Matching Algorithm, you can be confident that you’ll discover the perfect roommate for you. Roomi offers a filter for age, an LGBTQ+ friendly filter, and even a filter for home rules.

Find your perfect match now!

So, Which Is the Best Roommate Finder For You?

There are a lot of roommate finders out there, but only a handful of them provide the qualities you’ll need to find good roommates. Fortunately, Roomi has everything! Unlike websites like Kopa, where there is no formal verification, the Kopa alternative Roomi protects your personal information, has verified users, and carries out thorough background checks.

Start your journey with Roomi today and find a roommate in no time!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
FIND ROOMMATES
